entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
